pullrequest.title: Unicode strings and other Python 3 forward-compatible changes.

content.raw:
One more thing that you could to for python 3 compatibility in '''__main__.py''' add a if Python2 then import queue instead of Queue.

And in '''__init__.py'''' remove the imports for urllib2 and urlib they are unused anyway.
content.html:
One more thing that you could to for python 3 compatibility in '''main.py''' add a if Python2 then import queue instead of Queue.

And in '''init.py'''' remove the imports for urllib2 and urlib they are unused anyway.
